full_summary:
# Wharf Construction (Phase 2)
[Prosser Rock], NL
## Contract Details
* Solicitation Number: WS3952365869
* Publication Date: 2023-07-12
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-08T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 4 (last updated on 2023-08-04)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

## Business Requirements
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking the second phase of a Wharf construction in Prosser Rock, Newfoundland and Labrador. The contractor shall provide all necessary labor, equipment, and materials to complete the work, with a delivery date of 122 weeks after the award of contract.

### Technical Requirements

* The project involves the construction of a Wharf in Prosser Rock, NL.
* The contractor must provide all necessary labor, equipment, and materials to complete the work.
* The Wharf must be constructed to meet the specifications outlined in the contract documents.

### Contract Value
The estimated value of the contract is between $5,000,001 and $20,000,000.

### Security Requirements
The bidder must provide bid security in accordance with the tender documents.

### Preference and Trade Agreements
The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Commodities and Progress Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnerships (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## How to Participate
Suppliers interested in participating in this tender must be qualified suppliers and have been invited to bid. Interested suppliers can contact the contracting entity for more information.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

* Adam Beaumaster
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
* [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adam
